combat-range-overlay.no-good-tiles: No tiles are within movement range AND attack range
combat-range-overlay.show-turn-order-hint: Show combatant turn orders relative to the active token
combat-range-overlay.show-potential-targets-hint: Circle potential targets; color indicates how many actions of movement to reach target
combat-range-overlay.show-difficult-terrain-hint: Draw an overlay on top of difficult terrain
combat-range-overlay.show-walls-hint: Draw an overlay on top of all walls
combat-range-overlay.ic_visibility-hint: When should the overlay be visible during combat?
combat-range-overlay.ooc_visibility-hint: When should the overlay be visible out of combat?

visibilities.hotkeys: Only with ALT or token drag

combat-range-overlay.ranges-hint: Comma-separated list of ranges to choose from in the quick settings dialog

diagonals.name: Diagonals distance
diagonals.hint: How to calculate diagonal movement distance

controls.cant-open-no-selected-token: Can't open quick settings without a selected token
controls.cant-reset-no-token: Can't reset token position without a selected token

combat-range-overlay.activated-not-visible: The Combat Range Overlay is now activated but is not yet visible (see Settings for details)
combat-range-overlay.show-weapon-range-hint: Annotate selected token with current weapon range
